books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Jack Morgan, the head of the Private global investigative agency, probes the murders of members of the French cultural elite.
books.name: PRIVATE PARIS

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Two New Yorkers searching for the owner of an abandoned safe-deposit box reconstruct the history of a young woman and a forbidden love affair at the time of World War II.
books.name: PROPERTY OF A NOBLEWOMAN

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: A Carpathian novel; the 29th book in the Dark series.
books.name: DARK PROMISES

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Serena conceals her privileged upbringing by taking a job as a blackjack dealer on a cruise ship.
books.name: PLAYING THE ODDS

books.author: by Rachel Hauck
books.description: With her own wedding approaching, Charlotte pieces together the history of a vintage gown she finds.
books.name: THE WEDDING DRESS

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by C. J. Box
books.description: The 16th Joe Pickett novel features Nate Romanowski and a search for a domestic terror cell.
books.name: OFF THE GRID

books.author: by Sawyer Bennett
books.description: A hockey defenseman and a reformed partier reunite seven years after their relationship foundered.
books.name: HAWKE

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman returning to her hometown discovers that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.
books.name: THE LIAR

books.author: by Randy Wayne White
books.description: Doc Ford, a Florida marine biologist and former government agent, tracks an American who is working with ISIS.
books.name: DEEP BLUE

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
books.description: In the ninth book in this series, set in 1906, the New York detective Isaac Bell contends with a crime boss passing as a respectable businessman and a tycoon’s plot against Theodore Roosevelt.
books.name: THE GANGSTER

books.author: by Jeffery Deaver
books.description: Lincoln Rhyme and his new assistant, also a paraplegic, investigate a domestic terrorist who sabotages equipment.
books.name: THE STEEL KISS
